description:
Use this resource to create dayu layer 7 rule

~> **NOTE:** This resource only support resource Anti-DDoS of type `bgpip`

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Domain.description: Domain that the layer 7 rule works for. Valid string length ranges from 0 to 80.

HealthCheckCode.description: HTTP Status Code. The default is 26 and value range is 1-31. 1 means the return value '1xx' is health. 2 means the return value '2xx' is health. 4 means the return value '3xx' is health. 8 means the return value '4xx' is health. 16 means the return value '5xx' is health. If you want multiple return codes to indicate health, need to add the corresponding values.

HealthCheckHealthNum.description: Health threshold of health check, and the default is 3. If a success result is returned for the health check 3 consecutive times, indicates that the forwarding is normal. The value range is 2-10.

HealthCheckInterval.description: Interval time of health check. The value range is 10-60 sec, and the default is 15 sec.

HealthCheckMethod.description: Methods of health check. The default is 'HEAD', the available value are 'HEAD' and 'GET'.

HealthCheckPath.description: Path of health check. The default is `/`.

HealthCheckSwitch.description: Indicates whether health check is enabled. The default is `false`.

HealthCheckUnhealthNum.description: Unhealthy threshold of health check, and the default is 3. If the unhealth result is returned 3 consecutive times, indicates that the forwarding is abnormal. The value range is 2-10.

Protocol.description: Protocol of the rule, valid values are `http`, `https`.

ResourceId.description: ID of the resource that the layer 7 rule works for.

ResourceType.description: Type of the resource that the layer 7 rule works for, valid value is `bgpip`.

SourceList.description: Source list of the rule, it can be a set of ip sources or a set of domain sources. The number of items ranges from 1 to 16.

SourceType.description: Source type, 1 for source of host, 2 for source of ip.

SslId.description: SSL id, when the `protocol` is `https`, the field should be set with valid SSL id.

Switch.description: Indicate the rule will take effect or not.
